text: Thilakam is a 2002 Indian Malayalam film, directed by Sasi Mohan, starring Jagathy Sreekumar and Jomol in the lead role. http://spicyonion.com/title/thilakam-malayalam-movie/ ==Cast== * Jagathy Sreekumar as Pushpangathan * Jagadish as Venu * Jomol as Geetha * Koottikkal Jayachandran as Raghu * Saji Soman as Ravi * Sudheesh as Dileep * Umashankari as Maya *Santhakumari as Savithri *Jose Pellissery as Sankunni Nair ==References== ==External links== * Category:2002 films Category:Indian films Category:2000s Malayalam-language films
title: Thilakam (2002 film)
